description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Take your avatar on a scary journey through the ruins of a lost Mayan citadel. Team up with your friends in search of the sacred relics, but beware of the ancient creature that protects them...
